title: PLACEMENTS?
body: How do your first ever 10 placement games go, I know that if I am solo'qing 1 win roughly equals one division on average, however If I am to duo woth a season 4 gold-plat elo player how does my mmr get affected in that situation, Will I get much higher mmr gain from wins and less from losses due to my starting silver 4 mmr and playing against low gold mmr? Help a hobbit out fellow companions

replies.body: You get put where you get put, nobody knows how the mysterious system that rito implemented works.
What makes you think it works at all?

%%%% you riot
You admitted to letting your MMR drop. Don't complain about your own choice.
I know how  the mmr ratings work solo-q I'm only interested in how everything changes doing duo-q for first ever placements on this account
I was duo with a Season 4 gold/ pre season 5 Plat for my game, also bronze is the easiest thing to get out of, I could legit do it one handed

Why even bother having placement matches? The results are MEANINGLESS. Just dump everyone in bronze V and let us all struggle together.

In season 4 I went 3-7 (due to noobs, trolls and 4v5s) and got placed into bronze III. This year I went 4-6 (due to noobs and trolls but surprisingly no leavers this year) and got placed into bronze IV. If there's any logic behind this system, I'm not seeing it.

First placements, 5/5 Bronze 1
Ended season Bronze 1

Second placements, 4/6 bronze 2
Ended season Silver 1

Third placements, 7/3 Silver 3

Was Gold 5 Last season (and maintained comfortably). Went 2W/8L in placements and now in Bronze 2.

Go me.
went from s2 to b1 after going 5/5

My first placements I went 7/3 w/l, 1 loss 7 wins and 2 losses, and ended up Silver 3, and I was expecting bronze so can't complain. That was end of season 4 on SparksElm (my main), don't know if it's the same for players new to ranked this season. But you won your first match so that's a bonus there, going up from the start.

But for me as unranked, so I'm currently 1-0 and the one match I played I had a S4 platinum, and 3 S4 golds(with me on first ever placements) and their team with a plat 2 golds 2 silvers, how does this affect my mmr gains and ultimately my final placement
Well, assuming it's the same as last season, you would start at Silver 5 MMR, meaning those golds/plats you versed probably had terrible MMR, bad enough to get matched at S5 ELO.
